item.title: MEME is up 66.6% in the last 24 hours, now trading at $0.004
item.description: On August 23rd, based on HTX market data, Memecoin (MEME) has witnessed a remarkable 66.6% increase in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.004.

item.title: BERA surged above $2.7, with a 24-hour increase of 24.81%.
item.description: On August 23rd, based on HTX market data, BERA has soared to above $2.7 and is currently trading at $2.73, with a 24-hour increase of 24.81%.

item.title: This week the US Bitcoin Spot ETF saw a net outflow of $1.178 billion
item.description: On August 23rd, as monitored by Farside Investors, this week there was a net outflow of $1.178 billion in the U.S. Bitcoin spot ETF. This included:BlackRock IBIT: -$615 millionFidelity FBTC: -$235.3 millionBitwise BITB: -$60.8 millionARK ARKB: -$182.3 millionCoinShares BRRR: -$4.3 millionGrayscale GBTC: -$1.181 billionGrayscale Mini BTC: -$2.5 millionFranklin EZBC: +$13.4 millionVanEck HODL: +$26.4 million

item.title: Binance Alpha will launch Multiple Network (MTP) on August 25th.
item.description: August 23rd. According to official channels, Binance Alpha is scheduled to launch Multiple Network (MTP) on August 25th. Qualified users can access the Alpha activity page once Alpha trading commences and claim airdrops by using Alpha Points. Further details will be provided separately.

item.title: Trend Research withdrew 1,000,000 PENDLE tokens from Binance 15 minutes ago.
item.description: On August 23rd, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, Trend Research, a secondary investment institution affiliated with LD Capital, withdrew 1 million PENDLE from Binance 15 minutes ago. The value of this withdrawal is approximately $5.83 million.

item.title: Trend Research has once again withdrawn 28.21 million NEIROETH from the CEX, now holding a total of 67% of the tokens.
item.description: On August 23rd, as monitored by on-chain data analyst Yu Jin, Trend Research, a secondary investment institution of LD Capital, withdrew 28.21 million NEIROETH from Gate (with NEIRO in uppercase and contract suffix 2637) half an hour ago. This is equivalent to approximately $3.06 million.In addition to the 640 million tokens they accumulated from March to May, they now hold 67% of the total supply of NEIROETH (about 670 million tokens, with a value of $73 million).

item.title: A whale address is 3x long on XPL, currently enjoying an unrealized gain of approximately $900,000.
item.description: On August 23rd, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale address initiated a 3x leveraged long position in XPL yesterday. Currently, it has approximately $900,000 in unrealized gains. Nevertheless, this address still requires a profit of $1.9 million to achieve overall break-even.

item.title: Analyst: "Average Holding Cost for BTC Held <3 Months" Once Again Becomes Support Level During Bitcoin Pullback
item.description: August 23rd. Yesterday, on-chain data analyst Murphy posted on social media, stating that the market's concern about Powell's speech led to an early reaction, with the price dropping to $112,000 before the speech. This price just happened to be the average cost basis of "BTC held for less than 3 months."Murphy further explained that BTC held for less than 3 months represents a significant portion of short-term chips and is the most active part. The emotions of these new investors are also the most easily influenced. When the price falls below the cost line and paper gains turn into paper losses, significant psychological pressure is generated, causing the market sentiment to shift from optimistic to pessimistic. This cost line happens to be at $112,000; the support comes from the fact that when these short-term investors are close to breaking even, they are reluctant to sell more chips, overall reducing selling pressure. At least they have not completely lost confidence in the future

item.title: The Director of the IRS Digital Asset Office in the United States took office in March and resigned.
item.description: On August 23rd, Trish Turner, who heads the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Digital Assets Division, announced her resignation. She had held the position for just over three months. She posted on LinkedIn on Friday and said, "After more than 20 years of service at the IRS, I am bringing this remarkable career to an end. I sincerely thank all those who have influenced my professional path and given meaning to my work. Together, we have encountered complex challenges, launched long-lasting initiatives, and laid the foundation for the IRS's strategy as digital assets transitioned from the periphery to the mainstream."Turner's resignation occurred just over three months after she was appointed to lead the Digital Assets Division in early May this year.

item.title: Federal Reserve's Mester: Policy Rate May Need to Be Adjusted If Labor Market Risks Worsen
item.description: On August 23rd, Mohamed El-Erian of the Federal Reserve stated that the emphasis should be placed on the entire interest rate path rather than just the rate decision of a specific meeting. Inflation has been above the target level, and there are ongoing risks. The next employment report may be sufficient to demonstrate the need for a rate cut or it may not, depending on the specific details of the report. The Fed's policy will be moderately tightened. More data is required, and the rate outlook will continue to be revised until the September meeting. The risks in the labor market are increasing but have not yet become actual. It is expected that the inflationary impact of tariffs will gradually diminish. The rate path may involve a pause in rate cuts. If the risks in the labor market escalate, the policy rate may need to be adjusted. (FX678)
